title: CIAO LUCIA CARINA DRESS
desc: Ciao Lucia's founder Lucy Akin takes inspiration from her love of Europe for the Carina Dress. Sustainably made in LA from triacetate - a cellulose-based fabric - this mini is cut to a flippy 90s square-neck shape and features a delicate lace trim. Arriving in sky blue, Akin envisions a girl at a beautiful seaside hotel, tanning by the water and taking long afternoon strolls in this number.

title: PALM ANGELS CROPPED BEAR TEE
desc: Palm Angels' bear motif is instantly recognisable in the world of street fashion- and it takes centre stage at the chest on this light pink crew sweat- with its head cut off, of course. Crafted from pure cotton, it's cut to a cropped fit with a comfortable crewneck. Pair with some high waisted jeans and your favourite sneakers for a street-ready look.

title: GOLDEN GOOSE DELUXE BRAND STAR ZIPPED TRACK JACKET
desc: Drawing influences from retro tracksuits, this jacket from Golden Goose is detailed with branded tape detailing running down each arm. Cut from polyester, it's styled with a front zip and a snug funnel neck, then printed with white branding - including the label's iconic four-point star, of course - at the chest.

title: REEBOK NATURAL-DYE PANT
desc: These neutral-coloured pants from Reebok will be your new go-to pair on your off-duty days. Crafted from a super-soft French terry cotton, they're also styled with an adjustable drawstring waist and elasticated cuffs for a snug fit - and signed off with a woven brand patch above the hem, too.

title: NIKE ACG HALF ZIP BASE LAYER
desc: This half-zip base layer from Nike is a winner for adventurers - and perfect for all kinds of year-round outdoor activities. Crafted from a partially-recycled, stretchy polyester blend, it's fitted with a half-zip neck - allowing you to control air flow while you're embracing outdoor endeavours - and is stamped with printed branding on the chest.

title: COMME DES GARCONS PLAY WOMEN'S LITTLE RED HEART TEE
desc: Add a touch of Comme des Garcons PLAY's fun aesthetic to your wardrobe with this heart-detailed black tee. It's made from soft black cotton and features a classic crewneck to pair perfectly with any laid-back look.

title: SUNNEI LONG SLEEVE FRONT LOGO TEE
desc: Add a touch of Comme des Garçons PLAY's fun aesthetic to your wardrobe with this heart-detailed black tee. It's made from soft black cotton and features a classic crewneck to pair perfectly with any laid-back look.

title: BURBERRY ALL OVER LOGO TEE
desc: Burberry promises to inject your everyday looks with some luxury British flair thanks to this oversized, camel-coloured tee. Made from soft cotton, it arrives with relaxed drop sleeves and features bold, asymmetrical branding printed throughout.

title: COMME DES GARCONS PLAY WOMEN'S DOUBLE HEART LOGO TEE
desc: This Comme des Garcons PLAY tee embodies the diffusion line's fun, youthful aesthetic. It's simply cut from Japanese cotton and branded, not once, but twice with the iconic heart motif — a large pink print is joined with a little red appliqué front and centre.

title: LEVI'S DENIM SHERPA TRUCKER JACKET
desc: The humble denim jacket transitions seamlessly from summer to winter with this Sherpa fleece version from denim experts Levi's. It's made from cotton denim with a dark indigo wash and features a contrasting fleece collar and lining for a toasty feel. It's finished with a press stud closure, twin chest pockets and adjustable waist tabs for a truly personalised fit.

title: STAND STUDIO JANET JACKET
desc: Cosy-up this season in this black, faux-fur jacket from Stand Studio. It's made from a soft and cosy insulating material and features two side pockets to warm your hands and hold your belongings. Complete with a large retro collar and a metal clasp closure, this is your new, go-to overlayer.

title: MAX MARA ARCELLA TEDDY BOMBER JACKET
desc: Max Mara update the classic bomber style with its signature teddy fleece to create this cosy jacket. Arriving in a neutral-beige tone, it's crafted from a luxurious camelwool-silk blend and boasts a chic oversized silhouette, that's sure to cocoon you in warmth. It's finished with the usual bomber-style details, including snug ribbed trims and relaxed raglan sleeves.
